acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params.to: Address to send the tokens to (if zero, sends to the caller). Requirements: - Faucet must be unpaused. - Token must be configured and enabled. - Caller must wait for cooldown period since their last claim for this token. - Faucet contract must have enough balance of the token.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.cooldownSeconds: How many seconds a user must wait between claims for this token.
params.dropAmount: The amount of tokens to dispense per claim.
params.enabled: True to enable claiming this token, false to disable.
params.token: The ERC20 token address to configure.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

params.to: Destination address for the tokens (if zero, defaults to the owner).
params.token: The ERC20 token address to withdraw.

claim(address,address).notice: Claim the faucet drop for a given token. Can specify a recipient address.

getTokenConfig(address).notice: Get the configuration for a token.

nextClaimTime(address,address).notice: Get the next allowed claim time for a user on a given token.

secondsUntilNextClaim(address,address).notice: Returns how many seconds until a user can next claim a token. Returns 0 if claimable now.

setTokenConfig(address,bool,uint256,uint.notice: Configure a token for the faucet (enable/disable, set drop amount and cooldown).

withdraw(address,address,uint256).notice: Withdraw tokens from the faucet back to the owner (or another address).
